song.title: Cross Product
song.info:
Lyrics:
Listen to the tides you make Walk to center stage awaken I sit tight and smile again Visiting from far away
Sixteen words what ties they break Lingering your eyes they make me Forget I'm too sane to touch you Living underground awaits
Exit to your mind opaque Mercury arrives to take you I sit tight and smile again Listening from yesterday
Mission to your stars again Picturing your rocket taken Shadows paint the ground again Further into space awaits
